summary: This mod add 8 new styles of cloaks to the world of Skyrim. The cloaks are stand-alone which means wearing them won't replace any other equipment. They are completely craftable under the Glass category. They are also enchantable and upgradable.  UNP, CBBE and LB are not required.
descriptionHtml:
[img=800,447]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/29196-5-1356969321.jpg[/img]

[size=5]:: Description ::[/size]
[size=4]This mod add 8 new styles of cloaks to the world of Skyrim. The cloaks are stand-alone which means wearing them won't replace any other equipment. They are completely craftable under the Glass category. They are also enchantable and upgradable. UNP, CBBE and LB are not required.[/size]

[size=5]:: Installation ::[/size]
[size=4]To Install this mod:
NMM- Fairly straight-forward. Simply follow the standard installation instructions for installing a mod with Nexus Mod Manager.
Manual-Unpack the .7z into your Skyrim/ directory.
To Uninstall just delete the files pertinent to this mod.[/size]

[size=5]::Change Log::[/size]
[size=4]1.2
- Fix shader BUGS[/size]

[size=4]1.1
- remove the description of cloaks, so they won't block the enchantment discription
- add optional light armor and heavy armor vesion[/size]

[size=4]1.0
- Initial Release[/size]

[size=5]::Credits ::[/size]
[size=4]The mod is created by aronchack from ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAM, China.
Thanks to tinybeast and cynicalling for traslating this mod.
ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAM™ is an unofficial organization which devotes to making Skyrim mods.
Please email me: [url=mailto:aron.chack@gmail.com]aron.chack@gmail.com[/url] if you encounter any problems.[/size]

[size=5]::Permissions::[/size]
[size=4]Please feel free for use of my work in another mod, as long as you credit me and ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAM™ and add a link to the this mod.
It would be better if you send me or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4889513]tinybeast[/url] a message detailing your intentions . I just want to keep all things in track.[/size]
author: Aronchack
